summary: All-in-One Utility Platform: Phase 1 - Advanced Calculator Hub, Phase 2 - PDF Tools Module, Phase 3 - Advanced Image Tools Module with passport/government document photo makers, image compression, format conversion, background removal, and DPI adjustment, Phase 4 - SEO & Monetization Foundation with global SEO structure, AdSense-ready layout, performance optimization, and internal linking, Phase 5 - Advanced Resume Builder with Indian and International format templates. Phase 6 - Global Multi-Language System with 9 languages, language switcher in header, i18n structure, language-based URLs, hreflang tags, canonical tags, and lazy-loaded language files. SEO-optimized individual pages, mobile responsive, AdSense ready.
architectural_notes: Phase 1 only: Advanced Calculator Hub - other modules (PDF Tools, Image Tools, Resume Builder, Multi-language) deferred to later phases
Each calculator gets individual SEO-friendly page
Client-side instant calculation without page reload
Phase 3: Advanced Image Tools Module - client-side only processing, no server storage, no paid APIs
Image tools use browser-based libraries for format conversion, compression, and background removal
Job form special mode for government exam/passport/signature presets with target dimensions and file size
Footer updated: © 2026 RJY TOTAL MANPOWERS SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED
Phase 4: SEO & Monetization Foundation - no tool logic changes, only extend SEO structure and AdSense-ready layouts
All pages get dynamic SEO meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter cards, canonical tags, and structured data
